oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Roll of Company E, 1st Arkansas Regiment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Handwritten list and typed transcript of fifty-four names of enlisted men who served with Joseph Warren Van Meter during the Civil War. Joseph Warren Van Meter (1837-1903), Co. K, 7th Arkansas Infantry Regiment and Co. E, 1st Arkansas Infantry Regiment, CSA."
